name: 6 Pack Led Under Cabinet Lights Wireless with Charging Station, 7’’ Rechargeable Motion Sensor Light Indoor, Dimmable Closet Lights for Cabinets, Bookshelf, Stair, Hallway
short_description: 【Smaller and Brighter】-- 10 pure white LED with 95LM ( 6 Lights in 1 Pack ), 7’’ Mini size but bright enough to provide more possibility, Perfect for illuminating even the darkest corners, you can easily install it wherever needed. Unleash its radiance and banish shadows with ease.

【Rechargeable with Multiple Charging Station】-- The led closet lights can be charged by charging station or USB cable. The charging station can charge 3 devices at once, it's very convenient storage and keeps desktop neat and tidy.

【Dimmable Motion Sensor Closet Lights】-- These cabinet lights have two working modes: sensor and off. In sensing mode, it automatically turns on when motion is detected in a dark environment, and turns off automatically after about 25 seconds when no motion is detected.

【Easy to Install and Use】-- No hard wiring and tools required, very simple to install and remove. Method ①: Built-in powerful magnet, which can be directly adsorbed on any iron product. Method ②: Equipped with a magnetic piece with tape, which can be pasted wherever you need light. When the LED strip's battery needs charging, it can also be quickly removed and recharged.

【Wide Application】-- These sensor lights indoor are not only suitable for any cabinets of kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, pantry, cupboards, wardrobes, shoe cabinets, laundry rooms, garages, you can also place them inside drawers, dark staircase, tool boxes, trailer etc. Surprisingly, they won't take up too much storage.

name: Energizer Motion-Activated LED Path Light, Wireless, 20 Lumens, Battery Powered, White, Ideal for Hallway, Entryway, Stairs, Pathway, Night Light, 38183
short_description: Wireless Path Lights – Perfect for hallways, entryways, stairs, pathways, patios, decks, basements, sheds, garages and more
Indoor/Outdoor Lighting – This path light can be used indoors as a soft guide light or outdoors as a path light to help you navigate the darkness safely no matter where you are
Energy Efficient LED – A long-life LED means there are no bulbs to replace and the path light provides 20 Lumens of soft white light
Motion Activated – There are both motion-sensing and manual on/off modes for the path light with a motion detection range of up to 15ft. away

Battery-Operated LED – Wireless and easy to install, includes magnetic mounting with a metal bracket and double-sided tape and an easy-to-open battery compartment, which makes changing batteries easier; requires 3 AA batteries (not included)
product_description: A little light goes a long way with the Energizer Motion-Activated LED Path Light. The soft, white LEDs create a path of light to guide you safely through a dim room, hallway or outdoor pathway. With a 15 ft. detection range, the light turns on as soon as it senses motion, keeping the area safely lit during your evening routines. Works inside and outdoors. Put the path light in bedrooms, staircases, hallways, outdoor porches and walkways, garages and more. No electrical wiring makes for quick and effortless installation. Use the included metal bracket with magnetic mounting to position the light wherever you need it. To operate, simply install 3 AAA, set the switch inside the battery cavity to motion sensing mode and your light is ready to go. You can also set it to always on for constant light or turn it off to help conserve battery. No need to hire an electrician to add light inside or outside of your home. Bring light where it belongs with the Energizer Motion-Activated LED Path Light.

name: LUTEC 32W 3500 Lumen LED Security Lights Motion Sensor Light Outdoor, 5000K Daylight, IP65 Waterproof, Dusk to Dawn, Hardwired Motion Detector Flood Light for Garage, Yard, Porch-Black
short_description: ENERGY SAVING: LED units output 32 W, 3500 Lumen, 5000 K brightness (day light white), equivalent to 150 W halogen light. Also save your electricity bill by up to 88%

MOTION ACTIVATE: The wide sensing angle of 180 degrees detects motion up to 0 ft-69 ft away, detecting motion more accurately with its sensitive motion sensor. The adjustable timer can be set for tests, 1, 3 or 10 minutes

4 LIGHTING MODES: Test Mode, Security Mode, Dusk to Dawn Mode and Manual Override Mode. Manual override mode allows light to operate constantly for selected period of time (Flip the wall switch OFF-ON-OFF-ON within 3 seconds). More choices can meet different demand for each customer

METAL AND ROTATABLE DESIGN: Adjustable heads provide a customizable coverage area. Aluminum material, IP65 waterproof. Product size: 9.21in x 6.5in ( 154mm x 234mm). Works better with a 4.13" junction box
HIGH-QUALITY SERVICE: We provide 7*24 h after-sales service. Contact us if any issue arises

name: Tuffenough Solar Outdoor Lights 2500LM 210 LED Security Lights with Remote Control,3 Heads Motion Sensor Lights, IP65 Waterproof,270° Wide Angle Flood Wall Lights with 3 Modes(2 Packs)
short_description: 【Remote Control & 3 Lighting Modes】:Each solar motion sensor light is equipped with wireless remote control.You can choose the most suitable mode faster and more portable: ①Strong light sensor mode ② Dim light sensor mode ③Strong long light mode. Different lighting way for your daily requirement.

【Super Bright Solar Motion Sensor Lights】:The solar outdoor lights equipped with 210 super bright LED beads, produce up to 2500 lm 6500 K high brightness output and good heat dissipation. Perfectly illuminate your courtyard, garage, swimming pool.

【Wide Angle Illumination & PIR Motion Inductor】:3 adjustable heads design can horizontally. With innovative wide-angle and intelligent induction control, solar flood light detects up to 270 ° wide lighting angle and 26 feet sensing distance,which can provide extra brightness and more visible area.

【Long Working Time】:This solar powered flood light has a built-in 2000mAh rechargeable battery with the high-efficiency solar panel to ensure that it can be charged at less light day. Please set the solar light button on OFF state on cloudy and rainy days ensure the solarpanel is charged facing the sun for 2-3 days and turn on the light again.

【IP65 Waterproof & Wireless Design】:This solar lights are made of durable material, IP65 waterproof ensures the outdoor light fixture can function well even in heavy rain, snowstorms.It wireless design are easy to install, no needed with annoying wires or adapters, and no need to buy batteries. Only need to use the included screws to fix on the exterior wall.

name: STAR-SPANGLED Under Cabinet Lighting Rechargeable, 8 inch Motion Sensor Lights Indoor Battery Operated, USB Stick on LED Magnetic Closet Light Wireless for Counter, Stairs, Kitchen, Cool White, 2 Pack
short_description: Motion Sensor and Light Sensor: Set the under cabinet lights to AUTO mode, it auto turn on when human motion is detected within 120 degree and 16 ft in a dark or low-light environment, and auto turn off after no motion is detected within 20 seconds

Ultra-high Quality Light Source: 20 pcs 0.5W 140 Lm/W Ra 90 LEDs output 160 lumens with high CRI. Uses 80% high light transmittance lens, our under counter lights offer higher luminous efficiency, ensuring superior brightness while consuming less power

High-quality Rechargeable Battery and Fast Charging: Actual capacity up to 980 mAh, working time in motion sensor mode up to 30 - 45 days, in always-on mode up to 12 hours. Supports up to 1A charging. Comes with a 20 inch dual-ended USB-C charging cable

High-quality Magnetic and adhesive: Our motion sensor closet light is easy to take off and put back on when it needs a charge. Customized super-sticky iron pieces and strong magnets ensure stable installation, and can be easily installed on any surface

3 Ways to Install: Equipped with magnets and adhesive metal plates, it can be installed magnetically. There are hanging hole on the back for hanging installation. The four sides are designed to be horizontal and can be placed for installation

name: LUTEC 72W 7500LM LED Security Lights Motion Sensor Light Outdoor, 5000K Daylight, IP65 Waterproof, Dusk to Dawn, 3-Head Motion Detected Flood Light for Garage, Yard, Porch(Black)
short_description: ENERGY SAVING: LED units output 72W, 7500 Lumens, 5000K brightness(daylight white), equivalent to 720W incandescent bulb. Also save your electricity bill by up to 88%.

MOTION-ACTIVATED: The wide sensing angle of 180 degrees detects motion up to 0ft-69ft away, detecting motion more accurately with its sensitive motion sensor. The adjustable timer can be set for 1, 3 or 10 minutes.

4 LIGHTING MODES: Test Mode, Security Mode, Dusk to Dawn Mode and Manual Override Mode. Manual override mode allows light to operate constantly for selected period of time. Deactivates during daylight hours. More choices can meet different demands for each customer. Choose the most appropriate mode for your needs.

METAL AND ROTATABLE DESIGN: Adjustable heads provide a customizable coverage area. Aluminum material, IP65 waterproof and 50,000hrs lifespan, make this security light pecfect for the porch, back yard, front door, garage, driveway, walkway, step, etc.
HIGH-QUALITY SERVICE: We provide 7*24h after-sales service. Contact us if any issue arises.

name: Beams MB720 20 Lumen Wireless Battery Powered Motion Sensing Nightlight, 3-Pack, White
short_description: Extremely bright LED Light with minimum power consumption. This little light is mighty bright. Runs on AA Batteries.
Motion sensor turns LED light on and off automatically only when motion is detected. Activates only during darkness to conserve energy.
Weatherproof Design. Can be used as an Indoor Light or an Outdoor Light. UV-Resistant Plastic which prevents yellowing.
Motion detection at up to 10 feet. Simple wireless installation in minutes. Perfect as an LED night light, stair light, path light, or step light.
Sticks easily to walls, in bathrooms, and on staircases using included double sided tape. Also includes one wall mount bracket and anchors.

name: GE LED+ Motion Sensor LED Light Bulbs, 15W, PAR38 Outdoor Security Floodlight, Warm White (2 Pack)
short_description: Simple Setup: Screw GE LED+ Motion Sensor light bulb into a fixture that fits an E26 medium base and turn on the power; light will turn on automatically when motion is detected at night - no app, hub or Wi-Fi needed!

Security Light Bulb: Enhance home security with a motion sensor LED bulb by illuminating your outdoors at night - no fumbling for a light switch in the dark; wet-rated and weather-resistant for outdoor use

Motion-Activated Bulb: Built with an advanced automatic motion sensor, this outdoor flood light has a 90-degree viewing angle and can detect motion within 24 feet; equivalent to a 90-watt bulb but only consumes 15 watts, all backed by GE's renowned quality

Durable & Energy Efficient: With long-lasting LED technology, you can enjoy automatic on/off lighting with motion for up to 13.7 years saving up to $124 on energy bills over the bulb's lifespan; bulb turns off when no motion is detected saving you energy
What-s Included: Two (2) LED+ Motion Sensor PAR38 Outdoor Flood Light Bulbs, quick start guide; Explore the rest of the LED+ Family - a simple addition to everyday light
product_description: Illuminate your space with ease and efficiency using GE LED+ Motion Sensor LED Light Bulbs. Say goodbye to fumbling for switches in the dark - our bulbs automatically detect motion, instantly flooding your room with bright, energy-efficient light. With advanced motion detection technology, our motion-sensing light bulbs activate instantly when motion is detected. Whether you're arriving home after sunset, navigating outdoor spaces, or seeking added security, our motion-activated outdoor security lights provide reliable illumination exactly when you need it. GE LED+ motion sensor outdoor light bulbs are weather-resistant and wet-rated, able to withstand the elements while delivering optimal performance. Installation is a breeze - simply screw in the motion sensor LED bulbs like any standard light bulb and let them do the rest. No complex wiring or additional equipment required, making them ideal for DIY enthusiasts and busy households alike. Boasting energy-saving features and a sleek design, these light bulbs with motion sensors not only brighten your spaces but also cut down on energy consumption and add a touch of elegance to your outdoor spaces. Our porch lights will last for years to provide reliable and consistent lighting for your indoor and outdoor spaces because of the long-lasting LED technology. Enjoy the convenience of hands-free illumination with GE LED+ Motion Sensor Light Bulb - the intelligent lighting solution that keeps your home and outdoor areas well-lit and secure.

name: MAZ-TEK Plug in Motion Sensor Dimmable Night Light, Soft Warm White LED Nightlight with Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor, Adjustable Brightness for Bedroom, Bathroom, Kitchen, Hallway, Stairs,2 Pack
short_description: 3 BRIGHTNESS LEVELS - The motion sensor night light comes with 3 brightness levels (4/8/15 lumens). It gives the space appropriate illumination based on your choice. Controls are external facing making it easier to change the settings.

3 Lighting Modes Optional: “ON” Mode - constant on all day; "OFF" Mode-Turn off the light; “AUTO” Mode - remain OFF when ambient environment is bright enough, while turn ON automatically when motion detected at darkness within the sensing range (MAX: 12 ft., 120°) and turn off after 30 seconds of inactivity.

Energy Efficient: Equipped with 4 LED light bulbs, the maximum power consumption of the night light is 0. 5 W, so it costs you less than $0.2 per year to operate (based on 11/kWh), which helps save energy and money.

Available Occasions: Perfect for indoor places like stairs, garage, kitchen, hallway, bathroom, basement, corridor, cloakroom, living room, etc. to bring you and your family safety (never tripping in the dark any more) and convenience (no need to always turn on room lights).
What You Receive: 2* MAZ-TEK Plug-In motion activated night lights, 1* User Manual, up to 30 Month Warranty and Lifetime Technical Support.

name: Philips Solar Security Light Outdoor 302 LED 1200lm，Solar-Powered Waterproof Wall-Mounted Flood Light w/PIR Motion Sensor, 3 Heads, IP65 Waterproof, 3 Modes (2 Packs)
short_description: HIGH BRIGHTNESS AND WIDE BEAM ANGLE - Our solar floodlight boasts 302 high-brightness LEDs that emit a cool daylight color temperature of 7000K, producing a brightness of 1200 lumens. The light can be distributed widely with the help of three adjustable heads that can be rotated by 130°. It can cover a distance of up to 65.6ft.

HIGH-SENSITIVITY SENSOR AND 3 LIGHTING MODES - The PIR sensor on our light can detect ambient motion with a 49.2ft sensing range and 180° induction angle, and activate 3 nighttime lighting modes. These modes are: motion-activated 100% brightness for 25 seconds, always-on 10% brightness for 8 to 10 hours, or always-on 3% brightness with motion-activated 100% brightness for 25 seconds.

MULTIPLE USES AROUND THE HOME – With PIR sensor, high light output, and lighting modes, the Philips solar security light is suitable for use in the garden, yard, garage, pathways, front door, or any other outdoor location.

UPGRADED SOLAR PANEL AND HIGH-CAPACITY BATTERY – With an upgraded polycrystalline solar panel, our outdoor solar light offers enhanced durability and corrosion resistance. An improved solar conversion rate and high-capacity 1800 mAh battery allow for shorter charging times and extended usage periods.

WEATHERPROOF AND EASY TO INSTALL – Tested to resist corrosion and rust in heavy rain, high humidity, high sun and UV exposure, and extreme temperatures with IP65 rating. All accessories and instructions are included and no wiring is required. Assembled and ready to install out of the box.
